version-diff.intro:
This page displays a summary of the differences between two versions of !parent_name. Note that formatting is stripped before comparison, so only text changes are shown. Changes to the names of linked pages may not be reflected.

Currently comparing:

  • "!a_name," published !a_date
  • "!b_name," published !b_date

version.confirm_prepopulated: Form has been pre-filled with the content of the current version.
version.notice:
This page is the "!version_name" version of "!parent_name," published !version_date.

If you would like to view or link to the current version of "!parent_name," the preferred URL is:
!parent_url
version.orphaned: This !type is currently orphaned, it should have a versioned content type as its parent.

link.explanation: Click the link to continue to this URL

notifications.editbypass: This URL normally redirects to the link immediately. You are being shown the metadata page instead because you have edit permissions.
notifications.nourl: There is no url specified for this object

link.showpage: Display metadata page instead of immediately redirecting
